program_descriptions.elevator_pitch: Professional video converter to VVC (H.266) format with high compression efficiency
program_descriptions.short_description: Converts video files to VVC (H.266) format through RAW intermediate conversion
program_descriptions.long_description:
VVC Converter is a specialized tool for converting video files to the latest VVC (H.266) format. The conversion process involves two stages: first, the source video is converted to RAW format (YUV), then encoded to VVC. This ensures maximum quality preservation.
Key features: - Converts to VVC/H.266 format - Simple one-click operation - Progress bar showing conversion status - Output saved to D:/end-video folder
Requirements: - Source video: 1080p, 30fps maximum - Sufficient free space (100MB video â‰ˆ 5GB RAW temporary files) - Windows 10/11 64-bit
Instructions: 1. Run the program 2. Select source video file 3. Click "Start conversion" 4. Wait for progress bar to complete 5. Get converted video in D:/end-video folder
Note: RAW intermediate files are automatically deleted after conversion.
